RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxServerList

RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxServerList Class Reference

#include <foxserverlist.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxServerList:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The xIdent server list.

It shows a table containing the server list. Some buttons are available to add, edit or delete a given server.

Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum

The enumeration defining the Fox selectors, used in event mechanism.

Enumerator:
ID_NYI  Not Yet Implemented Identifier.
ID_ADD  The Add server button identifier.
ID_DEL  The Delete server button identifier.
ID_EDIT  The edit server button identifier.
ID_TABLE  The server table identifier.
ID_DESC  The description button identifier.
ID_TECH  The description button identifier.
ID_LAST  Setting the new value to FXMainWindow::ID_LAST.

Definition at line 430 of file foxserverlist.cpp.

long RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxServerList::onTableSelectionChange ( FXObject *  o,
FXSelector  sel,
void *  v 
)

The table selection callback.

It is called each time the table selection changed. It change the selection behavior by selectionning the whole row and set selServer to the current name with the getSelectedServerName() function.

See also:
selServer, getSelectedServerName
Parameters:
o A parameter used for FOX callbacks
sel A parameter used for FOX callbacks
v A parameter used for FOX callbacks
Returns:
Always 1

Definition at line 324 of file foxserverlist.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxServerList::feedTable (  )  [private]

The method feeding the account table.

It uses the tServerList retrived from xmlServerList serverList. It also calls setServerNumber(unsigned int) to change the total server number label.

Definition at line 142 of file foxserverlist.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxServerList::setServerNumber ( unsigned int  i  )  [private]

Change the number of account printed.

i.e. change the labPlCount content. It is called by the feedTable() method.

Parameters:
i The new value

Definition at line 184 of file foxserverlist.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxServerList::createTableHeader (  )  [private]

Creates the table's column headers.

This method must be called in refresh() because the table->clearItems() call also delete column headers.

Definition at line 281 of file foxserverlist.cpp.

FXString RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxServerList::getSelectedServerName (  )  [private]

Returns the name of the currently selected server.

It takes from the FXTable of server the selected row, and from this row number get the server's name.

See also:
selServer, onTableSelectionChange
Returns:
The selected server's name

Definition at line 301 of file foxserverlist.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxServerList::refresh (  )  [private]

Refresh the list of server.

It delete the actual serverList, re-creates it and reload the server information by a call to feedTable(). We must call createTableHeader() each time we call table->clearItems() because it removes the columns headers.

Definition at line 263 of file foxserverlist.cpp.

Member Data Documentation

FXString RainbruRPG::Gui::FoxServerList::selServer [private]

Contains the currently selected server's name.

If a server is selected, it contains its name. If no server is selected, it is an empty string. The value is changed in onTableSelectionChange(), using getSelectedServerName() to retrieve the current server's name.

Definition at line 106 of file foxserverlist.h.

The 'delete' button.

I keep it to be able enable/disable it in the onTableSelectionChange callback.
